title: PROGRAM 2: SLEEP ENHANCEMENT
subtitle: Weeks 1-4: Precision Timing
subtitleDescription: This phase tightens your sleep schedule from a 30-minute to a 15-minute window and begins the gradual process of extending sleep duration. You'll also establish a more structured evening routine.
videoDescription: Learn the fundamental movement patterns that build true functional strength: squat, hinge, push, pull, carry, and rotate. These movements translate directly to real-life activities and athletic performance.
description: This program builds upon basic sleep hygiene to create a more robust sleep system. Over 12 weeks, it addresses both sleep duration and quality through structured evening routines, strategic timing of activities, and environmental optimization. The program recognizes that people at this level often have demanding schedules but are ready to prioritize sleep. It emphasizes quality improvements for those who cannot immediately achieve 7-8 hours due to life circumstances.

sections.title: Overall Goals
items: Increase sleep from 5-6 hours to 6-7 hours (20% improvement)
Eliminate sleep disruptors (late caffeine, alcohol, screens)

sections.title: Why It's Beneficial
items: Quality Focus: Improves sleep architecture even when quantity is limited
Cognitive Benefits: Moving to 6-7 hours notably improves focus and decision-making
Stress Resilience: Better sleep quality enhances ability to handle daily stress
Metabolic Health: Adequate sleep supports weight management and blood sugar control
Sustainable Lifestyle: Creates habits that fit within busy schedules
